text:
LogDog | Tel Aviv, Israel | ONSITE | FULLTIME

LogDog is a cyber security startup, working to protect personal online accounts against hacking. We're looking for senior software developers to work on our client apps (iOS, Android) and our backend (Linux, Node.js, MongoDB, more). We believe in an open work environment where everyone could have a real impact.

Proven experience with one of the following is a big advantage:

- Working with web APIs

- Working on device/internet/web-app security

Contact me at alon@logdog.is
